text: In November 2020, Coons was named a candidate for [[Secretary of State]] in the [[Biden Administration]].<ref>{{cite news |title=Who Are Contenders for Biden’s Cabinet? |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/11/us/politics/biden-cabinet.html?action=click&module=Top%20Stories&pgtype=Homepage |accessdate=11 November 2020 |work=The New York Times |date=11 November 2020}}</ref>

In November 2020, Jones was named a candidate for [[United States Attorney General]] in the [[Biden Administration]].<ref>{{cite news |title=Who Are Contenders for Biden’s Cabinet? |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/11/us/politics/biden-cabinet.html?action=click&module=Top%20Stories&pgtype=Homepage |accessdate=11 November 2020 |work=The New York Times |date=11 November 2020}}</ref>

In November 2020, Bullock was named a candidate for [[Secretary of the Department of the Interior]] in the [[Biden Administration]].<ref>{{cite news |title=Who Are Contenders for Biden’s Cabinet? |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/11/us/politics/biden-cabinet.html?action=click&module=Top%20Stories&pgtype=Homepage |accessdate=11 November 2020 |work=The New York Times |date=11 November 2020}}</ref>

In November 2020, Burns was named a candidate for [[Secretary of State]] in the [[Biden Administration]].<ref>{{cite news |title=Who Are Contenders for Biden’s Cabinet? |url=https://www.nytimes.com/2020/11/11/us/politics/biden-cabinet.html?action=click&module=Top%20Stories&pgtype=Homepage |accessdate=11 November 2020 |work=The New York Times |date=11 November 2020}}</ref>
